description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，原国家级副职领导人。曾任中共中央书记处书记、中共中央统战部部长等职。因在六四事件中的表现被撤职，后复出任民政部副部长，并长期从事慈善事业。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China and a former deputy state leader. He served as a secretary of the Central Secretariat of the CPC and head of the United Front Work Department. He was dismissed for his actions during the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests, later returned to politics as Vice Minister of Civil Affairs, and was long involved in philanthropy.

description.zh-cn: 阎明复之父，中国共产党秘密党员，在国民党内部为中共搜集情报。文革期间被指控为“东北帮叛党投敌反革命集团”成员并死于秦城监狱。
description.en: Father of Yan Mingfu, a secret member of the Chinese Communist Party who gathered intelligence for the CCP from within the Kuomintang. During the Cultural Revolution, he was accused of being a member of the 'Northeast Gang Treason and Defection Counter-revolutionary Clique' and died in Qincheng Prison.

description.zh-cn: 阎明复之母。
description.en: Mother of Yan Mingfu.

description.zh-cn: 阎明复的妻子，曾于中共中央对外联络部工作。
description.en: Spouse of Yan Mingfu, formerly worked at the International Liaison Department of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 阎明复和吴克良的女儿。
description.en: Daughter of Yan Mingfu and Wu Keliang.

description.zh-cn: 阎明复的大姐。
description.en: Yan Mingfu's eldest sister.

description.zh-cn: 阎明复的二姐。
description.en: Yan Mingfu's second eldest sister.

description.zh-cn: 阎明复的长兄。
description.en: Yan Mingfu's eldest brother.

description.zh-cn: 阎明复的二哥。
description.en: Yan Mingfu's second eldest brother.

description.zh-cn: 阎明复的三姐。
description.en: Yan Mingfu's third eldest sister.

description.zh-cn: 阎明复的四弟。
description.en: Yan Mingfu's fourth younger brother.

description.zh-cn: 阎明复的妻子。
description.en: Spouse of Yan Mingfu.

description.zh-cn: 阎明复曾就读的小学。
description.en: A primary school that Yan Mingfu attended.

description.zh-cn: 阎明复曾就读的小学。
description.en: A primary school that Yan Mingfu attended.

description.zh-cn: 阎明复曾就读的中学。
description.en: A middle school that Yan Mingfu attended.

description.zh-cn: 阎明复曾就读的大学。
description.en: A university that Yan Mingfu attended.

zh-cn: 哈尔滨外国语专门学校

description.zh-cn: 阎明复曾就读的学校。
description.en: A school that Yan Mingfu attended.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党领导的全国性工会组织。
description.en: The national trade union federation of the People's Republic of China, led by the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的办事机构。
description.en: The administrative body of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party.

全国人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国全国人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The permanent body of the National People's Congress of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中共中央统一战线工作部

zh-cn: 中共中央统一战线工作部

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会负责统一战线工作的职能部门。
description.en: The functional department of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party responsible for united front work.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局及其常务委员会的办事机构。
description.en: The administrative body of the Politburo of the Chinese Communist Party and its Standing Committee.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议的全国性组织。
description.en: The national organization of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国民政部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国民政部

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管社会行政事务的组成部门。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for social administrative affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的全国性慈善组织。
description.en: A national charitable organization in the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国大百科全书出版社

zh-cn: 中国大百科全书出版社

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的一家图书出版社。
description.en: A book publishing house in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会直属的文献编译研究机构。
description.en: A document translation and research institution directly under the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共中央总书记。阎明复任中共中央书记处书记期间，赵紫阳是其直接上级。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, former General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee. Zhao Ziyang was Yan Mingfu's direct superior when Yan served as a secretary of the CPC Central Secretariat.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任全国政协主席。阎明复任全国政协副主席期间，李先念是其直接上级。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, former Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee. Li Xiannian was Yan Mingfu's direct superior when Yan served as Vice Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共中央总书记。阎明复任中共中央统战部部长初期，胡耀邦是其直接上级。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, former General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee. Hu Yaobang was Yan Mingfu's direct superior when Yan first served as head of the United Front Work Department.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共中央总书记。阎明复任中共中央统战部部长后期，江泽民是其直接上级。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, former General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee. Jiang Zemin was Yan Mingfu's direct superior during the latter part of Yan's tenure as head of the United Front Work Department.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任民政部部长和中华慈善总会会长。阎明复任民政部副部长期间，崔乃夫是其直接上级。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, former Minister of Civil Affairs and President of the China Charity Federation. Cui Naifu was Yan Mingfu's direct superior when Yan served as Vice Minister of Civil Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任民政部部长。阎明复任民政部副部长期间，多吉才让是其直接上级。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, former Minister of Civil Affairs. Doje Cering was Yan Mingfu's direct superior when Yan served as Vice Minister of Civil Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任国务院总理。阎明复任民政部副部长期间，李鹏是时任总理。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, former Premier of the State Council. Li Peng was the incumbent Premier when Yan Mingfu served as Vice Minister of Civil Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任全国人大常委会委员长。阎明复任全国人大常委会副秘书长期间，彭真是其直接上级。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, former Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress. Peng Zhen was Yan Mingfu's direct superior when Yan served as Deputy Secretary-General of the NPC Standing Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任全国人大常委会秘书长。阎明复任全国人大常委会副秘书长期间，王汉斌是其直接上级。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, former Secretary-General of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress. Wang Hanbin was Yan Mingfu's direct superior when Yan served as Deputy Secretary-General of the NPC Standing Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共中央办公厅主任。阎明复任中央办公厅翻译组组长期间，杨尚昆是其直接上级，后推荐阎明复出任中共中央统战部部长。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, former Director of the General Office of the CPC Central Committee. Yang Shangkun was Yan Mingfu's direct superior when Yan served as head of the translation group of the General Office, and later recommended Yan to be the head of the United Front Work Department.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共中央办公厅主任。阎明复任中央办公厅翻译组组长后期，汪东兴是其直接上级。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, former Director of the General Office of the CPC Central Committee. Wang Dongxing was Yan Mingfu's direct superior during the latter part of Yan's tenure as head of the translation group of the General Office.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的缔造者和第一代最高领导人。阎明复曾为他与赫鲁晓夫的会谈担任翻译，并于1975年在其指示下获释。
description.en: The founding father of the People's Republic of China and its first paramount leader. Yan Mingfu served as a translator for his meeting with Khrushchev and was released from prison in 1975 under his instruction.

description.zh-cn: 苏联政治家，曾任苏联共产党中央委员会第一书记。阎明复曾为他与毛泽东的会谈担任翻译。
description.en: A Soviet statesman who served as the First Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union. Yan Mingfu served as a translator for his meeting with Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任国家主席。阎明复曾随其率领的中共代表团出席苏共十九大并担任翻译。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, former Chairman of the PRC. Yan Mingfu attended the 19th Congress of the CPSU as a translator with the CPC delegation led by him.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共中央书记处书记。在六四事件中与阎明复一同被免职。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, former secretary of the CPC Central Secretariat. He was dismissed along with Yan Mingfu during the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共中央书记处书记。在六四事件中与阎明复一同被免职。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, former secretary of the CPC Central Secretariat. He was dismissed along with Yan Mingfu during the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任国务院总理。曾于2018年探望阎明复。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, former Premier of the State Council. He visited Yan Mingfu in 2018.

description.zh-cn: 1989年发生在北京天安门广场的政治事件。阎明复因在此事件中的表现而被免去中共中央书记处书记等职务。
description.en: A political event that took place in Tiananmen Square, Beijing in 1989. Yan Mingfu was dismissed from his post as secretary of the CPC Central Secretariat and other positions due to his actions during this event.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十三届中央委员会第四次全体会议

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十三届中央委员会第四次全体会议

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的一次重要会议，在此次会议上，阎明复与胡启立、芮杏文一同被免去中央书记处书记职务。
description.en: An important meeting of the Chinese Communist Party, at which Yan Mingfu, along with Hu Qili and Rui Xingwen, was dismissed from the post of secretary of the Central Secretariat.

nodes.id: 东北帮叛党投敌反革命集团

zh-cn: 东北帮叛党投敌反革命集团

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间的一个政治案件，阎明复的父亲阎宝航被指控为此集团成员并因此被迫害致死，阎明复本人也受此牵连被捕入狱。
description.en: A political case during the Cultural Revolution. Yan Mingfu's father, Yan Baohang, was accused of being a member of this group and was persecuted to death. Yan Mingfu himself was also implicated and imprisoned.

description.zh-cn: 中国第一部大型现代综合性百科全书。阎明复曾任中国大百科全书出版社副总编辑，并大力推动了该书的编纂工作。
description.en: The first large-scale modern comprehensive encyclopedia in China. Yan Mingfu served as the deputy editor-in-chief of the Encyclopedia of China Publishing House and greatly promoted the compilation of this work.

description.zh-cn: 阎明复的出生地。
description.en: The birthplace of Yan Mingfu.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物。曾任中共中央统战部副部长。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China. He served as the Deputy Head of the United Front Work Department of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物。曾任中共中央统战部副部长。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China. He served as the Deputy Head of the United Front Work Department of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物。曾任中共中央统战部副部长。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China. He served as the Deputy Head of the United Front Work Department of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物。曾任中共中央统战部副部长。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China. He served as the Deputy Head of the United Front Work Department of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物。曾任中共中央统战部副部长。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China. He served as the Deputy Head of the United Front Work Department of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物。曾任中共中央统战部副部长。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China. She served as the Deputy Head of the United Front Work Department of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 阎宝航是阎明复的父亲。
description.en: Yan Baohang is the father of Yan Mingfu.

description.zh-cn: 高素是阎明复的母亲。
description.en: Gao Su is the mother of Yan Mingfu.

description.zh-cn: 阎明复是阎兰的父亲。
description.en: Yan Mingfu is the father of Yan Lan.

relationships.target: 哈尔滨外国语专门学校

description.zh-cn: 杨尚昆时任中共中央办公厅主任。
description.en: Yang Shangkun was the Director of the General Office of the CPC Central Committee at the time.

description.zh-cn: 汪东兴时任中共中央办公厅主任。
description.en: Wang Dongxing was the Director of the General Office of the CPC Central Committee at the time.

relationships.source: 东北帮叛党投敌反革命集团

description.zh-cn: 阎宝航因被指控为“东北帮叛党投敌反革命集团”成员而被捕，并于1968年在秦城监狱去世。
description.en: Yan Baohang was arrested for being accused as a member of the 'Northeast Gang Treason and Defection Counter-revolutionary Clique' and died in Qincheng Prison in 1968.

relationships.source: 东北帮叛党投敌反革命集团

description.zh-cn: 阎明复受父亲阎宝航的案件牵连，以“苏修特务”等罪名被捕，在秦城监狱关押至1975年。
description.en: Implicated in his father Yan Baohang's case, Yan Mingfu was arrested on charges such as 'Soviet revisionist special agent' and was imprisoned in Qincheng Prison until 1975.

description.zh-cn: 在毛泽东的指示下，阎明复于1975年4月获释出狱。
description.en: Under Mao Zedong's instruction, Yan Mingfu was released from prison in April 1975.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国全国人民代表大会常务委员会

position.zh-cn: 全国人大常委会副秘书长
position.en: Deputy Secretary-General of the NPC Standing Committee

description.zh-cn: 彭真时任全国人大常委会委员长。
description.en: Peng Zhen was the Chairman of the NPC Standing Committee at the time.

relationships.target: 中共中央统一战线工作部

description.zh-cn: 1985年，经杨尚昆推荐，阎明复出任中共中央统战部部长。
description.en: In 1985, upon Yang Shangkun's recommendation, Yan Mingfu was appointed as the Head of the United Front Work Department of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 赵紫阳时任中共中央总书记。
description.en: Zhao Ziyang was the General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee at the time.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

position.en: Vice Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee

description.zh-cn: 李先念时任全国政协主席。
description.en: Li Xiannian was the Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee at the time.

description.zh-cn: 因在六四事件过程中的表现，阎明复被免去中央书记处书记等职务。
description.en: Due to his actions during the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests, Yan Mingfu was dismissed from his positions, including Secretary of the Central Secretariat.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十三届中央委员会第四次全体会议

description.zh-cn: 在中共十三届四中全会上，阎明复被免去中央书记处书记职务。
description.en: At the Fourth Plenary Session of the 13th Central Committee of the CPC, Yan Mingfu was removed from his post as Secretary of the Central Secretariat.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国民政部

description.zh-cn: 崔乃夫时任民政部部长。
description.en: Cui Naifu was the Minister of Civil Affairs at the time.

description.zh-cn: 多吉才让时任民政部部长。
description.en: Doje Cering was the Minister of Civil Affairs at the time.

description.zh-cn: 阎明复参与创办了中华慈善总会。
description.en: Yan Mingfu participated in the founding of the China Charity Federation.

description.zh-cn: 阎明复在担任中国大百科全书出版社副总编辑期间，大力推动了《中国大百科全书》的编纂工作。
description.en: During his tenure as deputy editor-in-chief of the Encyclopedia of China Publishing House, Yan Mingfu vigorously promoted the compilation of the Encyclopedia of China.

description.zh-cn: 2018年11月，温家宝前往医院看望阎明复。
description.en: In November 2018, Wen Jiabao visited Yan Mingfu in the hospital.
